p: For the investigation of morpho-anatomical structures that produce and accumulate secondary metabolites, the second and third fresh leaves, isolated from shoots cultured in vitro, were used and subjected to scanning electron (SEM) and light microscopy. For SEM, leaf samples were coated with a thin layer of gold in a BAL-TEC SCD 005 (BAL-TEC GmbH, Schalksm√ºhle, Germany) sputter coater. Both adaxial and abaxial surfaces were examined with a JEOL JSM-6390 LV (JEOL, Tokyo, Japan).
